com.rift.coad.lib.cache
Class CacheRegistry

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.cache.CacheRegistry

public class CacheRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

The cache registery is responsible for managing the cache information for the deployments. Each deployment gets its own class loader and own cache entry.

Nested Class Summary
 class CacheRegistry.CacheListManager
          This object is responsible for managing a list of cache entries.

Method Detail

init

public static CacheRegistry init(CoadunationThreadGroup threadGroup)
                          throws CacheException
This method returns an instance of the cache registry object. Do not call more than once.

Parameters:
threadGroup - The thread group used for initialization purposes.
Returns:
The reference to the cache registry object.
Throws:
CacheException

getInstance

public static CacheRegistry getInstance()
                                 throws CacheException
This method returns an instance of the cache registry object.

Returns:
The reference to the cache registry object.
Throws:
CacheException

initCache

public void initCache()
               throws CacheException
This method inits the cache for a given class loader. This is based on the class loader that attached to the calling thread.

Throws:
CacheException

getCache

public Cache getCache(java.lang.Class cacheClass)
               throws CacheException
This method inits the cache for a given class loader. This is based on the class loader that attached to the calling thread.

Parameters:
cacheClass - The cache class to retrieve.
Returns:
The reference to the requested cache class.
Throws:
CacheException

terminateCache

public void terminateCache()
                    throws CacheException
This method terminates the cache for the class loader making the request.

Throws:
CacheException

shutdown

public void shutdown()
              throws CacheException
This method shuts down the cache registry

Throws:
CacheException
